articles.title: As Putin Ups Nuclear Rhetoric, PM Modi Speaks With Ukraine's Zelensky - NDTV
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke with Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky on phone today and raised concerns over safety of nuclear installations in the east European nation that is battling Russian forces.
articles.content: <li>The two leaders spoke nearly two weeks after Russian President Vladimir Putin declared a partial mobilisation, calling up some three lakh reservists in a major escalation of his tapering invasion… [+2351 chars]

articles.title: EU moves ahead with plans to standardize phone chargers by 2024 - CBC News
articles.description: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPhone maker Apple more than its rivals.
articles.content: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPh… [+1599 chars]
